body:
Hello there,

I am doing some Glare analysis for which it would be fundamental to model water properly.

I am having difficulties to  input the materials definitions I have found in this [Link](http://www.arch.mcgill.ca/prof/reinhart/software/Radiance/HowToModelWater.html) in the honeybee library, I think I am formatting the string not properly,

Any suggestion?

Thanks!
